Articles.Content:
Hey! Im a gamer just like most of you kerbals!

Im doing a KSP series and it would help me out a lot if you subbed and liked my vids haha. Live commentary all dat stuff haha http://www.youtube.com/user/pinkieseb

Thats only if you wanna see how bad I am.

I would love it if someone could watch my vids and tell me what im doing so horribly wrong in KSP? Ha :/

So yup, forums here i am!!!

Welcome to the Forums! Liked and subscribed! It looks like you are progressing well. Remember launching to the east (90 deg heading) will give you a free 175m/s because of the rotation of kerbin. ASAS is a heading hold and SAS is just a 'kill rotation' when it's activated. Keep launching and keep pushing the limits of your space craft! I will be watching! Also, I have a few vids up as well if you're interested! (links in sig)

I shall watch and comment.

welcome to the forums.

Thanks both of you.

Wow i didnt think this game would be so technical! I knew the gravity was realistic but i didnt think launching to the east helped... Thanks!

Oh and I will probably look at your tutorial vids haha
